app.title: Sudoku Solver
app.siteTitle: Sudoku Solver | Free Online Sudoku Solution Tool
app.description: A free online tool to automatically solve Sudoku puzzles. Simply input the puzzle and instantly display the solution. Can display all solutions when multiple solutions exist. Supports 9x9 Sudoku puzzles.

solver.noSolutionMessage: This puzzle has no solution. Please check your input.
